titleStmt.title: The true interest of nations impartially stated in a sermon preached at the Lent assizes at Chelmesford in Essex, March 2d. 1690/1 : proving that the promoting universal righteousness, piety, justice, and honesty, is the sure means to exalt a nation ... / by Anthony Walker ...
titleStmt.author: Walker, Anthony, d. 1692.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
